short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks productive websites, so you can relax

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Productivity Blocker is the first extension for blocking any website that makes you productive. Whether it’s sending an email, checking LinkedIn or brushing up on your Dutch, consider it gone, outta here, geblokkeerd (that’s “blocked” in Dutch, but try not to retain that information right now).

Let the rigidly enforced good times roll. 

(Click the Productivity Blocker icon on your browser to toggle it on/off).
